sanskrit_text: agním īḷe puróhitaṃ yajñásya devám ṛtvíjam | hótāraṃ ratnadhā́tamam ||
translation: I praise Agni, the household priest, the divine minister of the sacrifice, the invoker, the most bestowing of wealth.

sanskrit_text: agníḥ pū́rvebhir ṛ́ṣibhir ī́ḍyo nū́tanair utá | sá devā́m̐ éhá vakṣati ||
translation: Agni, worthy of praise by former sages and by present ones, will bring the gods here.

sanskrit_text: agninā́ rayím aśnavat póṣam evá divé-dive | yaśásaṃ vīrávattamam ||
translation: Through Agni one may obtain wealth and prosperity day by day, which brings glory and heroic sons.
